blocks.text: Single campus map page exported to PNG from each source PDF in the maps directory.

items: Maps are labeled with the hospital name; click to open a full-resolution PNG.
Sources: Kennestone campus flyer and patient guide, plus patient guides for Cobb, Douglas, North Fulton, and Paulding.
All PNGs generated locally with pdftoppm at 200 DPI to preserve readability.

blocks.text: Select a map to view or download.
